channel.title: Easy Help - Coder Needed
channel.description:
Hi, i need a script that will allow character to receive a starter pack on the grounds that they haven't received one before. I want them to receive full steel and 150k.
Something like (I'm a ruby coder so I'm not very good with Java); [code] Else if (command = (starter)) if "variable that allows you to receive starter" == 0 then send message "You receive your starter pack!" add item (whatever they are) "variable that allows you to receive starter" = 1 [/code]
I probably got this so wrong as to be unreal, but if anyone can help, post below!

item.title: Easy Help - Coder Needed
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Hi, i need a script that will allow character to receive a starter pack on the grounds that they haven’t received one before.
I want them to receive full steel and 150k.

Something like (I’m a ruby coder so I’m not very good with Java);

Else if (command = (starter))
if "variable that allows you to receive starter" == 0
then send message "You receive your starter pack!"
       add item (whatever they are)
       "variable that allows you to receive starter" = 1

I probably got this so wrong as to be unreal, but if anyone can help, post below!

Read full topic
